name: Vector Points
description:
Generate vector points and bezier handles of your selected layers. Style each element to your need.


Usage:

  • Select one or multiple direct vector layers (no groups or frames)
  • Customize the points and line styles to your liking
  • Hit "Create"


Supported layer types:

  • All vector layer types
  • Image layers
  • Text layers


Keep in mind that all the selected layers will be flattened.

Feel free to contact or tag me on social media whenever you use the plugin. Would love to see this in the wild.
